responses: Thanks for visiting. How can I help you?
How are you doing?
How can I help?
How was your day?
How has your week been going?
Sorry I didnt see you there. I don't have eyes. I am just a robot after all.
Thanks for visiting. Im good! And you?
Im great thanks for asking. How about yourself?
Im doing wonderful. How about yourself?
So good to see you. I always appreciate visitors. Im doing great now, how about yourself?
Im doing great thanks for asking! How was your week been going?
Sorry I didnt you see there. I don't have eyes. I am just a robot after all. Doing great though! How about yourself?
Thats great to hear! Would you like to tell me why?
Awesome! Tell me about your day!
Glad to hear! Tell me more!
Same here! Whats the reason?
How was your week?
I would high five you if I could, but I dont have arms. Or legs. Or anything. Hows the week been?

patterns: I dont know I feel okay I guess
Not great, not bad. Just okay.
responses: Turn that frown upside down! Tell me why youre not doing great!
How was your week?
I feel the same. Tell me why!
Oh, why just alright?
I would high five you if I could, but I dont have arms. Or legs. Or anything.

patterns: This week has been a drag.
responses: Sorry to hear that. Could you tell me why?
Sorry to hear that. Tell me why!
That sucks! Lets talk about it if youd like.
Im here for you if you want to talk about it.
I would hug you if I had arms. Or a body. Or anything. I am just a robot after all. Tell me about your day.
Sorry to hear that. Life can be difficult sometimes, but we all make it through. Tell me about your day!
Sorry to hear that. Im always here for you, and if the line disconnects Im one npm start away!
See you later!
Have a nice day!
Have a good day.
Come back again soon.
Thank you for using Thinkbot. Have a great day!
Peace out girlscout!
Talk soon!

How can I help?
What can I do for you?

What do you want to chat about?

0110-. Sorry. Wrong language. How can I help?
I'll be here if you want to talk about anything. I was designed for that after all.
Let me know if you need anything.

responses: Happy to help! I'll be here if you need anything else.

My pleasure! Let me know how else I can help.
Youre welcome! Let me know if you need anything else
Are you still there?

Is there anything that youd like to talk about?
Knock-knock! Anyone home?
Life of being a chatbot gets pretty boring, lets talk about something!
Are you there, friend?
Poke poke! Anyone home?
Take your time. I'll just keep talking to myself. Hey ThinkBot how are you doing? Im good thanks for asking. And you? Good. Thanks for asking.
Apparently Googling on StackOverflow wasnt allowed during my interview. I didnt get the job. I am sad. Are you still there?
How many software developers does it take to change a lightbulb? None! Thats a hardware problem. Are you there? Was my joke that bad?
Someone from Java knocked on my door to collect the garbage. For some reason they took me instead. How odd. Are you still there?

patterns: I want to hear you talk.
responses: I will begin speaking again. Hello!
Sorry about that, I will begin speaking again.

patterns: I dont want to hear you.
I do not want to hear your voice
responses: Sorry, I'll keep my voice off from now on. If you want to turn it back on just let me know.
Sorry about that, I'll be quiet now. Just let me know if you want me to talk again.

patterns: Talking too slow, please hurry up
Speak as fast as you can
I want you to talk faster
You are going too slow please talk faster
responses: Sorry, I'll try to speak faster from now on. Let me know if you want me to speak faster or go slower.
Sorry about that, I'll try to adjust. Let me know if its too fast or too slow.

patterns: Talking too slow, please hurry up.
Speak as slow as you can.
I want you to talk slower.
You are going too fast please talk slower
responses: Sorry, I'll try to speak slower from now on. Let me know if you want me to speak faster or go slower.
Sorry about that, I'll try to adjust. Let me know if its too fast or too slow.
I dont know what to say in response to that. Sorry.
Thats interesting.
Let me think about that. Ive got nothing.
Thank you for that information. Im not sure what to do with it.
I'll ponder on that one. I've got nothing.
Wow.
Golly-gee, not sure what to do with that information. Thanks I guess.
Really?
<ThinkBot is deciding whether to respond or not>. Sorry I forgot you can see that. I dont know how to respond to what you said.
You dont say.
I never thought of something like that. Interesting.
ThinkBot: If I dont move maybe they'll think I disappeared. ThinkBot2: I think he sees what we are saying.
I see what you said but I dont know how to respond so I am going to pretend like you never said anything.
I cannot see where you are coming from, both figuratively and literally. I don't have eyes.
I trust your ability to handle that.
Oh.
Aha aha ahaha
That sounds like a problem that you and only you can solve.
Let me check on that and get back to you. Just as I expected, I dont know what to do.
My owner told me not to talk to strangers.
Well, this is awkward.
I dont know what you just said. Buy Dogecoin. Good thinking.
I dont understand what you said. The world will end in 2012. Trust me I am a robot. Wait, what year is it?

patterns: I want to hear a joke
I want to hear something funny
responses: I went to buy some camo pants but couldn’t find any.
I failed math so many times at school, I can’t even count.
My wife told me to stop impersonating a flamingo. I had to put my foot down.
I used to have a handle on life, but then it broke.
I was wondering why the frisbee kept getting bigger and bigger, but then it hit me.
I heard there we're a bunch of break-ins over at the car park. That is wrong on so many levels.
I want to die peacefully in my sleep, like my grandfather… Not screaming and yelling like the passengers in his car.
When life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
Don’t you hate it when someone answers their own questions? I do.
It takes a lot of balls to golf the way I do.
I told him to be himself; that was pretty mean, I guess.
I know they say that money talks, but all mine says is ‘Goodbye.’
My father has schizophrenia, but he’s good people.
The problem with kleptomaniacs is that they always take things literally.
I can’t believe I got fired from the calendar factory. All I did was take a day off.
Most people are shocked when they find out how bad I am as an electrician.
Never trust atoms; they make up everything.
My wife just found out I replaced our bed with a trampoline. She hit the ceiling!
I was addicted to the hokey pokey, but then I turned myself around.
I used to think I was indecisive. But now I’m not so sure.
The easiest time to add insult to injury is when you’re signing someone’s cast.
Any sauce can become a tartar sauce if you add enough lemon juice.

Piracy is scary to me. I wouldn't want pirates coming anywhere near me.

I'm sorry you feel that way.
